author: TravisEz13
body:
In PR #3818, removed some dynamic parameters for the Certificate provider.  The following parameter should be brought back:

- [ ] `DocumentEncryptionCert`
- [ ] `SSLServerAuthentication`
- [ ] `DNSName`
- [ ] `Eku`
- [ ] `ExpiringInDays`
title: Certificate provider should be able to filter on `DocumentEncryptionCert`
